value:
$WmMPID_ウード,ch04_20_Eudes_M_Normal,Face|I see that you have gathered the
courage to appear before me again,
fated rival!$k$pWe, who have strode the paths of the
cosmos for untold eons, must finally
take blade in hand and leap—$k$p$WmMPID_クリフ,ch10_17_Qulyf_M_Normal,Face|We're ready to fight.$k$p$WmMPID_インバース,ch04_31_Inverse_F_Normal,Face|Let's take it nice and slow. We should
savor every moment!$k$p$WmMPID_ロキ味方,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face|I find the idea of facing this world's
$Nu delicious...$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_02,0|$WmMPID_ウード,ch04_20_Eudes_M_Normal,Face|You have demonstrated your
puissance with aplomb, O dark
savior.$k$pWe will chant your name, Summoner!
A shout for $Nu!$k$p$WmMPID_クリフ,ch10_17_Qulyf_M_Normal,Face|If you summon us, we'll fight by your
side. I'm almost looking forward to it.$k$p$WmMPID_インバース,ch04_31_Inverse_F_Normal,Face|I know I am. Hee-hee.$k$p$WmMPID_ロキ味方,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face|Don't rush into things... I want to be
yours too, $Nu.$k$pI'm very interested in you, you know.$k$pYou've been giving your all to fight
the Loki of this world in a life-or-
death battle...$k$pBut I'm a completely different
creature. You could have me all to
yourself for eternity...$k$pCall on me when you want. I'll be
there, $Nu!$k$p$Sbs150|
